title: Unable to Login or recover account, not getting response from ticket.
body:
Hi, Im having an issue with loging into my League of Legends account (The account I am currently on is one I just created). I've submitted at ticket yesterday, but still no response 24 hours later. I have tried recovering the account, but I am not receiving the recovery E-mail. 

Has anyone else had this issue before?

replies.body:
Response times are a bit longer right now due to the volume of tickets we've had submitted recently. If you sit tight, we'll have an account specialist with you as soon as it's possible.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
